PA_Q1.header: Have you tried a weight management program for at least 6 months within the past year? (e.g. Noom, Weight Watchers)
PA_Q1.description: If you have, this will increase the likelihood of insurance covering your GLP-1 medication.

PA_Q2.header: Please describe your weight loss journey.
PA_Q2.description: How long have you struggled with weight? Are there particular life events or triggers for your weight gain?

PA_Q3.header: What race do you identify with?
PA_Q3.description: You may select all that apply. At times, our providers will use this for clinical decisions.

answerOptions.text: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
